body: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into domain spells that she has not prepared ahead of time. She can “lose” a prepared spell in order to cast any domain spell of the same level or lower. This replaces spontaneous casting.
name: Spontaneous Domain Casting
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Storm Druid/Spontaneous Domain Casting
